attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the public
attributes.additional_details: It's distressing for alot of people and no consideration for any pets or animal. It can be a trigger for those men and women who have served in our armed forces. Its nothing but unsettling for many, even our emergency services. To many people can obtain fireworks and there is no control over them at all
attributes.background:
To stop the sale of fireworks to the public and ban them being used freely. 

Should be display only at safe and secure locations for the one night only.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action:

Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639319
